item.title: Live updates: Trump’s polarizing pick for the Pentagon to make case to GOP senators
item.description: Get the latest news on the transition to the new administration of President-elect Donald Trump and a new Congress.

item.title: Should a lame-duck Congress confirm judges? Yes for us, no for you.

item.title: Police records reveal new details about sexual assault allegation against Pete Hegseth
item.description: The incident has roiled Trump’s transition team since the former president announced Hegseth as his nominee for defense secretary.

item.title: Who is Linda McMahon? Trump donor, WWE co-founder is education secretary pick.
item.description: The 76-year-old, who has donated tens of millions of dollars to Donald Trump’s campaigns over the years, co-chairs the transition team.
